actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a deduction for water and sewer service charges in the same manner as the deduction allowed for real property taxes.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an income tax deduction for amounts imposed by local government as charges for water or sewer services.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a deduction for water and sewer service charges in the same manner as the deduction allowed for real property taxes.
